title: League's 7 Deadly sins

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Just a little bit of fun i had.

**Hecarim** - Greed leads to betrayal, and it was such that birthed the shadow isles.
**LeBlanc** - Manipulating the desires of men, comes naturally to the Deceiver. 
**Nidalee** - Not restrained by society's boundaries, you indulge yourself, whenever and however you please. 
**Azir** - Shurima fell because of one man's pride.
**Yorick** - When an eternity of nothing stretches out before you, there is no need to rush.
**Karthus** - Always envious of the exultation of true death.
**Kalista** - Consumed by wrath, forever in pursuit of her betrayer.


A bit different to usual fan art/designs, but I hope you enjoy, none the less. 

-Obito Uchiha-

replies.body: I kind of like this https://i.ytimg.com/vi/B7S9mrhmxOs/hqdefault.jpg more lol (Spongebob Squarepants, 7 deadly sins). You make me want to re-read lore now though xP Such clean art that is <:o #muchopretty #nicenice
